snippet: With business getting better, the stress level from working overtime has increased, and I am starting to experience something I might call “value conflict.” We want to give the customers great service, but we also don’t want to burn out our...
abstract: With business getting better, the stress level from working overtime has increased, and I am starting to experience something I might call “value conflict.” We want to give the customers great service, but we also don’t want to burn out our people.

headline.main: The True Price of Customer Service
